description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Mousse Filled Easter Eggs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Mousse Filled Easter Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully cut tops of hollow Easter eggs. Put dark chocolate, in a heatproof bowl and place over a saucepan of simmering water. Stir until smooth. Remove from heat and stand for 5 minutes.
Beat thickened cream until soft peaks form. Add 1/3 of cream mixture to chocolate and gently stir until combined. Add remaining cream and stir until combined. Spoon into prepared Easter eggs. Serve.
